articles.title: Gary Sanchez, Gio Urshela react to Yankees-Twins trade - NJ.com
articles.description: The New York Yankees traded catcher Gary Sanchez and third baseman Gio Urshela to the Minnesota Twins on Sunday.
articles.content:
For Gary Sanchez and Gio Urshela, Monday was the first day of the rest of their lives.
